description:
Stop designing from scratch


This Design System can serve as the building blocks for product design systems, kickstart new projects, or help you to flesh out ideas.


  • +500 components to build interfaces of any complexity.


  • 8px grid system for consistent and scalable interfaces.


  • +280 simply beautiful open source icons to get started.


  • Get inspiration with ready-to-use layout samples.
